NiceSurveys Review

Below is my NiceSurveys review.

What is NiceSurveys?

NiceSurveys is a new online survey platform that’s available as a website and an app (Android). You can sign up if you live in the U.S., Canada, the U.K., or Australia.

The idea is simple: You answer questions, share your honest thoughts about products and services, and earn a little money in return.

When you join NiceSurveys, you’ll get access to surveys that can pay anywhere from just a few cents to a couple of dollars each. Some surveys take just 7 or 10 minutes, while others can be closer to 30 minutes.

Once you reach the payout minimum of $1 to $5, you can cash out through PayPal, Venmo, or a long list of gift cards like Amazon – there are over 150 gift card options available. I really like that they give you so many ways to cash out. Not every survey site has this many choices, especially with a low payout minimum.

Is NiceSurveys legit?

Whenever I test a new survey site, the first thing I look for is whether it’s actually legit. I never want you wasting your time on scams or sites that never pay out.

I can say that NiceSurveys is real – I tested it myself and I saw actual surveys waiting for me every time I logged in. I earned a $5 Amazon gift card and received it pretty quickly.

  • Complete your profile – You’ll answer questions about yourself, like your age, job, household details (such as if you have any kids), and more. This helps NiceSurveys match you with surveys you’re more likely to qualify for.
  • Pick your surveys – Once your profile is ready, you’ll see surveys waiting on your dashboard. Each survey shows how much it pays, how long it should take, and a star rating from other users.   • Cash out – Once you reach the payout minimum (as low as $1 for an Amazon gift card), you can choose PayPal, Venmo, or pick from more than 150 gift cards.

One feature I like is the Welcome Bonus Streak. If you complete a survey daily for 30 days, you can earn little bonuses along the way. You can even miss up to 5 days and still get the full streak bonus. It’s not a huge amount, but it’s an easy way to add a few extra dollars to your balance.

How much can you make with NiceSurveys?

You’re not going to get rich with online surveys, but it can be an easy way to earn some extra pocket money while watching TV or waiting around.

When I tested NiceSurveys, I saw surveys that paid anywhere from 38 cents for a 7-minute survey up to around $1.86 for longer ones that took 15–25 minutes.

Most surveys were in the 50 cents to $1.50 range.

The time estimates were mostly accurate, but like all survey sites, some surveys may run longer than expected. I liked that my first $5 payout came through in about 24 hours. After that, I read in other NiceSurveys reviews that future payments would be more instant.

The low payout minimum is a big plus for me – I don’t like sites that make you wait to cash out.

  • Low pay for some surveys: Like all survey sites, some surveys do pay less than you’d hope for the time they take. It’s important to look at the time estimate and payout so you know what to expect.

Overall, NiceSurveys is legit and easy to use, but you do have to go in with realistic expectations. It’s best for a little extra money on the side, not for a full-time paycheck.
